name: Hot Water
description:
A Harry Lloyd masterpiece partially re-imagined for today's retro pixel gamer.

Hot Water the movie is an episodic look at married life and in-law problems. Hot Water the game is not that.

Enjoy the soft boiled game play.

Credits:

  • Kenney or www.kenney.nl for tile sets
  • Sixty for sprites and ideas
  • KFP for testing
  • Jse M. for dev
